## About

I’m a cybersecurity professional focused on governance, risk, and data privacy, with 4 years of experience across compliance, third-party risk management, and audit support. Based in Burnaby (Metro Vancouver), I’m completing an MBA at University Canada West (Expected 2026) to strengthen strategic and leadership capabilities.
